courseDescription:
In this course, you will learn about the various methods to carry out circuit analysis using the Laplace transform method. The concept of transfer functions in signal processing, as well as the importance of the convolution integral, will also be covered in this course. Then, this course will teach you about the various graphical approaches to evaluating the convolution integral, and also define the concept of network stability.

Then, the course will introduce you to the concept of two-port networks in an electrical circuit. The various methods to determine the admittance parameters as well as identifying the hybrid parameters of a circuit will also be covered in this course. Lastly, this course will teach you how transmission parameters are used in electrical circuits, and how to analyse the interconnection of networks in circuits.

This course is helpful for learners who want to understand the foundation behind carrying out circuit analysis using the Laplace transform methods. Learners can also gain an understanding of how transfer functions are important in signal processing for circuits. Begin this course now to learn about important parameters in an electrical circuit, as well as how networks are connected in a circuit.
